backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking animation fix requirements to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing prewritten summaries for several frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining color variables, dark mode values, and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling the input form, surprise view, animation replay, and audio mute logic.
frontend/src/components/TeddyChocolateAn: Multi‑phase teddy bear chocolate‑eating animation with timed effects, audio playback, and reduced‑motion handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity changes using react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining a romantic color palette and utility classes for background, text, and borders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint mounting React with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, typography, and plugins. Extends theme with OKLCH-based color system, custom keyframes, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the app’s purpose, features, issues, and animation enhancement requests. Includes metadata such as schema version, feature list, and known animation bugs.
